resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: Frontend developer assigned to the ODC project (the origination of credit cards), System developed for the registration and consultation of financial data of customers through their ID to different credit institutions throughout Peru, this system allows to speed up the evaluation process and CENCOSUD credit card allocation to different bank customers.

work.title: Functional analyst - QA / Analista Funcional - QA
work.description: Prepare the functional analysis of new applications for different organizations, as well as update and improve existing ones; that is, it must control, analyze and supervise the functional development of computer applications, ensuring their correct exploitation and optimal performance.

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: Developer Frontend in the project: The Money Table, development and layout of screens. Web system for remittance auctions (Dollars and Soles).

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: Frontend developer, development of App for the quotation of the terrestrial, aerial, maritime ticket and tourist packages. with the ReactJS framework together with the MaterialUI library, under the Scrum development methodology.

projects.title: Proyect Ticket Manager
projects.category: A simple task ticket management tool developed to support the management of a project using agile methodologies such as Scrum.

projects.title: MERN Stack TikTok Clone
projects.category: TikTok Clone built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

projects.title: Github Jobs
projects.category: A simple application that consumes the github jobs api and performs searches built with ReactJS and Hooks

projects.title: React Fitebase Chat
projects.category: A simple chat app built with ReactJS and Firebase

testimonials.text: Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination embraces the entire world, stimulating progress, giving birth to evolution.
The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance, it is the illusion of knowledge.
When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
